Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>「大地に生きるヒト」<White>……か…… いい言葉だよね……
Entry.EnglishText: "<Yellow>One Mankind that shares this earth<White>," huh... That's a great way to put it...

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな……<Yellow>ヒト<White>なんだよね！ ヒューマもガジュマもなく……<Yellow>ヒト<White>なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We're all <Yellow>Human<White> after all! Not Huma, not Gajuma... We're <Yellow>Human<White> beings.

Entry.JapaneseText: いきなり、どうしたんだ、<Mao>？
Entry.EnglishText: What's gotten into you all of a sudden, <Mao>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん！ ちょっとクレアさんの言葉に感動しただけ！
Entry.EnglishText: Nothing! I was just moved by what Claire said!
